title: [娱乐]DynamicSlot —— 用心理学欺骗玩家进服 [理论全版本]
author: 小张up
txt_content:
本帖最后由 小张up 于 2020-8-10 19:29 编辑 
DynamicSlot
让最大人数永远大一！





image.png (17.36 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-4-13 10:04 上传







二搬原因
原贴的版本过于老久，且DynamicSlot相比原贴也更新了许多，故做此二搬


插件简介
这个插件可以持续的让你的最大比在线人数大一，并且你可以自由修改
让玩家有一种"我是最终填满服务器的玩家！"的错觉，吸引玩家心理学欺骗服主进帖


安装方法
1.将DynamicSlot.jar放入plugins文件夹
2.在DynamicSlot文件夹中更改config.yml
3.重新启动服务器


命令
/ dynamicslot：
检查看帮助菜单
权限：dynamicslot.list

/ dynamicslot set：
更改dynamicslot配置
实例：/ dynamicslot set max 5
权限：dynamicslot.config

/ dynamicslot reload：
重载dynamicslot配置
权限：dynamicslot.reload


功能
设置最小人数
设置最大人数
设置比当前在线人数更多的人数
自定义服务器最大人数大小（无限制的任何整数）
蹦极支持！


配置文件# DynamicSlot config
# Use to fix slot at specified amount# put 1 into this if you want like ItsJerryAndHarry server# Example: fixedslot: 1 , server will always have 1 slot (but player always can join)# -1 = disablefixedslot: -1
# Minimum slot that can be# -1 = disablemin: -1
# Maximum number that slot should slot expand# -1 = unlimitedmax: -1
# How much slot should more that player# Example: min: 5 , slotleft: 2 , if there are 8 player online , server will full at 10 slotslotleft: 1
#limit total player in the server# -3 = unlimited , -2 = follow max: , -1 = disableplayerlimit: -3
# Message that player receive when server is full# Color code allow (%) Example: %c for RED)# just put -1 if you want to disable (can disable only when playerlimit is Unlimited or Disable)# Please use '-' infront of messagekickfullmsg: -&c&lSORRY , SERVER IS FULL!%newline%PLEASE TRY AGAIN LATER.
